text: The 2003 Georgian constitutional referendum was a referendum that was held on 2 November 2003 alongside parliamentary elections. Question was: Are you for or against the reduction in the number of Georgian parliamentarians to 150 members?. ==Results== Choice Votes % For 1,590,309 89.61 Against 184,209 10.39 Invalid/blank votes 123,466 â€“ Total 1,904,105 100 Registered voters/turnout 3,178,593 63.89 Source: Direct Democracy Source: Direct Democracy Source: Direct Democracy Category:Politics of Georgia (country) Category:2000s in Georgia (country) Category:Referendums
title: 2003 Georgian constitutional referendum
